mapper.insert: insert into m_cart (cart_number, member_number, product_number, product_selectCount, cartoption_number) values (cart_number_seq.nextval, #{member_number}, #{product_number}, #{product_selectCount}, co_number_seq.nextval)
insert into m_cartoption (optionlist_number, cartoption_number, option_number, option_selectCount) values (option_list_seq.nextval, #{cartoption_number}, #{option_number}, #{option_selectCount})
mapper.update: update m_cartoption set option_selectCount = #{option_selectCount} where optionlist_number= #{optionlist_number}
mapper.select: select DISTINCT cart_number, c.cartoption_number, p.product_number, m.member_number, member_name, product_name, product_selectcount, product_price, product_m_image, (product_price*product_selectcount) money from m_member m, m_cart c, m_product p, m_cartoption t, m_option o where m.member_number=c.member_number and c.product_number=p.product_number and c.member_number=#{member_number} order by cart_number

select cart_number, t.cartoption_number, option_selectCount, optionlist_number, option_price, option_name, optionlist_number, o.option_number, m.member_number, (option_price * option_selectCount) sumOption from m_member m, m_cart c, m_cartoption t, m_option o where m.member_number=c.member_number and c.cartoption_number=t.cartoption_number and o.option_number=t.option_number and c.cartoption_number=#{cartoption_number} order by cart_number
